name: Hyperuranion's Waiting Room
description:
Are you tired of all this phenomenology and would like to become more noumenic?

Being the ontological foundation of reality has always been your dream, but you have no IDEA how to achieve it?

This is your chance: Fight with other solids to earn shard and get closer to perfection climbing the hierarchy of forms, today you will be able to move from imitation to idea, what are you waiting for? Step into the arena!

You might have already guessed it, but this game has some hilarious bugs. Just a couple of them

"My planet needs me" https://gfycat.com/CanineNeatBlackfootedferret

"Let's make an attack that destroys everything. What could possibly go wrong?" https://gfycat.com/SecretAgedHumpbackwhale

"Ok, bug fixed, commit! Now on the next feature" https://gfycat.com/TornBareBlacklab

"What if we add some particles?" https://gfycat.com/PresentQuaintBonobo
